txt.en: Hadorion wants your help preventing the culprit from making an escape by sea.
Hadorion has completed his investigation and needs your help to solve the case.
A Vile Trail Marked by Shadow

'Good, you're here. The shipwreck is over yonder in the clearing.

'They make fast for an escape using scavenged parts from the shipwreck.

'We must be quick!'
'This Khâshap has gotten away, but now we know what his goal was: to deliver this Bile of Ifrinn.\n\n'We must pursue him at all costs. Meet me back at Barad Faen to discuss our options.'
Follow Hadorion in confronting the true culprit to solve the case.
'Let us rid ourselves of this place.'
Indagir, or Khâshap has made their escape. Talk to Hadorion for further instructions.
